properties.name: piiController
properties.description: Name of the first Controller who collects the data

properties.name: email
properties.description: Contact email address of the Controller

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Contact phone number of the Controller

properties.name: onBehalf
properties.description: A user information (PII) Processor acting on behalf of a Controller or PII Processor

properties.name: piiControllerUrl
properties.description: A URL for contacting the Controller

properties.name: postOfficeBoxNumber
properties.description: Post Office Box Number of the Controller

properties.name: UserClaimUpdate.Email.EnableVerification
properties.displayName: Enable user email verification on update
properties.description: Trigger a verification notification when user's email address is updated.

properties.name: UserClaimUpdate.Email.VerificationCode.ExpiryTime
properties.displayName: Email verification on update link expiry time
properties.description: Validity time of the email confirmation link in minutes.
